text: % Ventriculomegaly 90% Agnosia 50% Cerebral calcification 50% Chorea 50% Hypertonia 50% Neurological speech impairment 50% Oculomotor apraxia 50% Seizures 50% Abnormality of the abdominal organs 7.5% Acute leukemia 7.5% Hydrocephalus 7.5% Abnormal upper motor neuron morphology - Abnormality of the foot - Abnormality of the hand - Aggressive behavior - Apraxia - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Axonal loss - Babinski sign - Basal ganglia calcification - Caudate atrophy - Cerebral atrophy - Disin
